extensionDescription.message: Add Cantonese pronunciation (Jyutping) on Chinese characters.

popupCheckboxText.message: Inject automatically（<ruby class="inject-jyutping">自<rp>(</rp><rt lang="yue-Latn">zi6</rt><rp>)</rp></ruby><ruby class="inject-jyutping">動<rp>(</rp><rt lang="yue-Latn">dung6</rt><rp>)</rp></ruby><ruby class="inject-jyutping">注<rp>(</rp><rt lang="yue-Latn">zyu3</rt><rp>)</rp></ruby><ruby class="inject-jyutping">入<rp>(</rp><rt lang="yue-Latn">jap6</rt><rp>)</rp></ruby>）

refreshPromptText.message: Please refresh the page for the change to take effect.
